description: Marian Louvre is the daughter of Commander Louvre, and the engineer who designed and was in charge of Project Bismarck. She was trained at Cavalry Command under General Whitehawk. Before joining the Star Sheriffs she was a professional tennis player. In early episodes of the series, Marian had an unrequited crush on Richard, which may explain why in the WEP produced episodes, Marian has a robotic horse named Nova with the abilities of Saber`s Steed.
name: Marian Louvre
